Name: Spheria's Familiar
About the game: This game is a fantasy RPG featuring a modern-day NEET (uneducated, unemployed young man) summoned into a parallel universe by a magical girl to become her sadistic Familiar and create havoc! The protagonist of the story goes on a journey with his master, the magical girl, to stop Demon King's resurrection. Within his journey, the protagonist comes to the truth behind his summoning. Game Features: ・A turn-based magical fantasy RPG ・Easy battle system Battle against weak enemies is done in an instant with a single attack ・The Demon King's Henchwomen They are strong enemies, but once you defeat them, you can summon them in battles at any time and deploy their special attacks. ・Multiple endings How this story ends will depend on what choices you make. ・Clearing the game unlocks the Debug Mode! Using the Debug Mode will break the game.
